name: Sea Sweeper
description:
Go fishing for trash in Sea Sweeper,  a small C++ game made in 24 hours for SEAJAM!

How to Play

  • Your cursor is a fishing hook. Left click a piece of trash to grab it!
  • While carrying trash, left click above the water to remove it from the ocean.
  • The game ends once all the trash is removed. Clean out the sea as fast as possible!
